name: zonal_statistics
description: Calculates statistics for each zone specified in a file.

regions.description: GeoJSON or a path to a GeoJSON file containing the regions. For paths you must specify the path to a user-uploaded file without the user id in the path.

func.description: Statistical function to calculate for the specified zones.

scale.description: A nominal scale in meters of the projection to work in.

interval.description: Interval to group the time series.

FileNotFound.description: The specified file does not exist.
